data.name: Into Oblivion - Private Reserve
data.detailed_description:
The Into Oblivion - Private Reserve DLC contains such goodies as the soundtrack, wallpapers, and printable card game. As we release content updates for the game, we will pack more things into it as well. Read on for details and content lists.


Currently, here is what is inside:
  • The game soundtrack with music from Macabre Gandhi and David Totten
  • Nine wallpapers of characters from the game
  • A printable version of the card game to play at home
  • A thank you note from CoaguCo

Into Oblivion: The Card Game
A printable PDF of all the games cards. It includes some unique cards not found in the computer version, as well as modified versions of others for home use. The PDF also has a list of all needed materials (like dice and a pen), the official rules, and a score sheet to keep track of your points. It can be played with or without legal beverages for your country and age.

Into Oblivion: Soundtrack
The full soundtrack includes the following tracks:
  • 1 - Mould Menu (Judas is Carrion Redux 2)
  • 2 - Alcoholic Affair (ForAbsolutelyNoReasonAtAll)
  • 3 - Beer Brawl (Go Ahead)
  • 4 - Cognac Crisis (NowThatsThatBullshssh)
  • 5 - Drambuie Deathmatch (Visceral00)
  • 6 - Ethanol Event (Profound Footage)
  • 7 - Firewater Fight (Depends On The Situation)

data.short_description: The Into Oblivion - Private Reserve DLC contains such goodies as the soundtrack, wallpapers, and printable card game!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP and up
  • Processor: Intel or AMD
  • Graphics: Onboard is fine
  • Additional Notes: You will need a printer for the card game
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP and up
  • Processor: Intel or AMD
  • Graphics: Onboard is fine
  • Additional Notes: You will need a printer for the card game

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 and up
  • Processor: Intel or AMD
  • Graphics: Onboard is fine
  • Additional Notes: You will need a printer for the card game
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 and up
  • Processor: Intel or AMD
  • Graphics: Onboard is fine
  • Additional Notes: You will need a printer for the card game
